import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./AboutMe.css';import ScreenHeading from'../../utilities/ScreenHeading/ScreenHeading';import ScrollService from'../../utilities/ScrollService';import Animations from'../../utilities/Animations';import gwikinaResume from'../../assets/Resume/Wikina_Gideon_Resume.pdf';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AboutMe(props){var fadeInScreenHandler=function fadeInScreenHandler(screen){if(screen.fadeInScreen!==props.id)return;Animations.animations.fadeInScreen(props.id);};var fadeInSubscription=ScrollService.currentScreenFadeIn.subscribe(fadeInScreenHandler);var SCREEN_CONSTANT={description:"
        As a current Software Engineering student at Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT), technology changed my life in a way that is difficult to explain. 
        It changed the way that I thought about things. What started as an extension of my education has become a tool for personal growth.
        Understanding software has allowed me to understand people and their needs. I have been blessed to work in different industries such as hospitality, 
        fin-tech, and big tech. In all cases pushing code into production and seeing the fruits of my labor. I have a lot to offer and hopefully you and I will
        be working together soon!
        ",highlights:{bullets:['Full Stack Web Engineering','Interactive Front-end','Cloud Computing','Developing React Apps','Building REST APIs','Managing Databases','IoT & Blockchain'],heading:"Here are a few highlights... "}};useEffect(function(){return function(){/* UNSUBSCRIBE THE SUBSCRIPTIONS */fadeInSubscription.unsubscribe();};},[fadeInSubscription]);var renderHighlights=function renderHighlights(){return SCREEN_CONSTANT.highlights.bullets.map(function(highlight,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"highlight",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"highlight-blob"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" ",highlight," "]})]},i);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-me-container  screen-container fade-in",id:props.id||"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-parent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScreenHeading,{title:'About Me',subHeading:'I am your guy'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-me-profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"about-me-descripption",children:[" ",SCREEN_CONSTANT.description," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-highlights",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"highlight-heading",children:SCREEN_CONSTANT.highlights.heading}),renderHighlights()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-me-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn primary-btn",onClick:function onClick(){return ScrollService.scrollHandler.scrollToHireMe();},children:" Hire Me "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:gwikinaResume,download:gwikinaResume,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn highlighted-btn",children:" Get Resume "})})]})]})]})]})});}
